transcript:
Customer: Wo check kar lena.

Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Aur ye hai, hi sir, very good evening, kaise hain aap?
Executive: Boliye madam.
Customer: Sir, Sweety baat kar rahi thi sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan haan boliye.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji, actually sir aapke yahan secondary person ek hai, secondary number ek add hai yahan pe, kal actually unhone concern raise kiya hua hai sir mail pe buyleads ke liye.
Executive: To kal maine unse discussion kiya tha, maine samjhane ki bhi koshish ki but wo samajhne ki koshish hi nahi kar rahe isliye maine aapse ek baar discussion karna zyada better samjha ki main ek baar aapse discuss kar leti hun, I think buyleads wagera.
Executive: Actually sir dekhiye concern unka ye hai ki wo ye keh rahe hain ki aap mere ko portal pe buylead na deke aap mere ko mail par buylead share kijiye aur maine wahan pe unko samjhane ka koshish kiya to he is like ki humne paise diya hai aap hum jaisa chahenge aapko waisa karna padega.
Executive: Right, to aap ek cheez bataiye sir aapko to wahan pe IndiaMART ne pehle bhi jo bhi aapko IndiaMART se aapka renewal uthaya wahan pe to bataya gaya hoga na ki mail pe hum sirf notification dete hain ki aapko ye buylead aayi hai hum mail like buylead hum aapko nahi dete hain mail par, right, maine group already aapka banwa rakha hai already aap meri team se Ruchi aapka catalog dekh rahi hain jo mere under hai, Ruchi ko bhi maine group mein add kar liya hai, Ruchi aapko daily basis pe buylead share karengi aur maine unko ye cheez bhi boli hai ki group mein hi hum aapko buylead bhejenge aap wahan par consume kar lijiye.
Executive: To wo keh rahe hain group mein mujhe nahi chahiye mujhe mail par chahiye.
Executive: To aap bataiye sir phir kaise karna hai kyunki IndiaMART mein to possible hi nahi hai ki hum mail par buylead share karein aur rahi baat WhatsApp ki to WhatsApp par bhi hum client ka personally help karane ke liye hum buylead bhejte hain, ye bhi IndiaMART hume nahi bolti hai karne ke liye, ye hum personally karte hain taki client ka experience improve ho paaye wo hum karwa paaye taki hum IndiaMART pe customer lambe time tak reh sake.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Aur abhi wo aap leads bhi zyada nahi bhej rahe na mam aap.
Executive: Sir already jo aapka city hai na wo actually kya hai thoda limited city hai jaisa aapne mujhe group mein bhi bheja hua tha right, to uske according na mere ko city aapko bhi pata hai ki daily basis pe na un locations pe city city nahi like generate ho payegi lekin jab bhi generate hoti hai main aapko bhejne ka try karti hun, aage bhi main try karungi ki thoda sa idhar beech mein Diwali wagera tha to thoda sa wahan pe na main khud bhi utna nahi bhej paayi thi lekin main aage se ab main try karungi ki Ruchi ko maine handover kiya hua hai to wo at least properly aapka catalog dekhe aur wahan pe aapka buylead aapko bheje.
Executive: Theek hai, I think unse discussion bhi hua tha aap logon ka, Ruchi ke saath discussion hua tha na aapka?
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Matlab phir aapke unka hi hua hoga sir jo aapke employee hain unke saath hi hua hoga.
Customer: Ab unko kyun handover kar rahe hain isko catalog ko?
Executive: Actually actually kya hai sir ki mera promotion ho gaya isi mahine to I am the manager here now to abhi wo mere team mein hai mere under hai wo to wahi aapka catalog dekhenge baki wo to main bhi aap mere ko directly mujhe bhi call kar sakte ho zaroori nahi hai ki aap Ruchi ko call karoge lekin agar Ruchi aapse discussion karne ke liye ya phir koi bhi cheeze coordinate karne ke liye aapko call kare to main bas isliye bata rahi hun taki aap unko bata paao ki haan theek hai wo bhi dekh rahi hain main bhi dekh rahi hun.
Executive: Theek hai?
Executive: Haan baki ye jo unhone concern open kiya hai sir main phir ye concern close kar dun na aap please ek baar unse discuss kar lijiyega ki ye cheeze possible nahi hai, group mein humne already personally basis pe bola tha main group mein bhijwane ke liye ready hun aap unko group se boliye ki buylead consume karein sir.
Customer: Ye group group kidhar hai kya pata kab kab ye maine abhi hello bhej sir ye maine hello aapko dobara bheja hai group jo maine add kiya hua hai sir wo maine October mein hi add kiya hua hai sir group, ek group aapka October ka bhi hai aapka teen mahina pehla baat hua tha ek lead buylead karke denge bole aap teen mahine ke baad abhi aap bol rahe ki email pe nahi hoga phir hum WhatsApp pe bhejenge.
Customer: Sir ye mam kya kya karte phir?
Executive: Sir jo aapse mera discussion hua tha wo bhi to WhatsApp ka hi hoga hua tha mail ka to kabhi discussion hi nahi hua hai sir aap se mera.
Customer: WhatsApp ka hua tha aapne kitna lead bheje mere ko?
Executive: Aap dekhiye pehle ka aapko group dikh raha hai kya aap ek baar group dekhiye maine abhi dobara hello dala hua hai aapko group mein.


Customer: October mein October mein ek bheja hai aur haan October mein group bhi create hua tha sir.
Executive: Group bhi jo hamara create hua tha wo October mein hi hua tha baat karke.
Customer: Aap dekho mam business ka halat kya hai aap hi dekho.
Executive: Sir wo mujhe pata hai sir aapse mera pura discussion ho rakha hai wo mujhe aapko bata matlab aapko mujhe baar baar batane ki zaroorat nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi aap hi teen do buylead bheja hai matlab aapka halat kya hai aur hum aapke peeche lag ke hamara halat kya hoga wo dekhiye.
Executive: Sir aapko lagne ki zaroorat nahi hai aapko lagne ki zaroorat nahi hai hum khud aapko bhejenge lekin wo mein jo mail wali cheeze hain sir wo hum nahi kar sakte bas main aapko wo batane ke liye maine call kiya, rahi baat lead ki aapko lead aaj se hi jaana shuru ho jayega aapko agar apne employee ko add karna hai to aap please isme add kar lijiye ya phir aap mujhe bata dijiye main add kar dungi theek hai but wahi.
Executive: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello. [unintelligible] [inaudible]
Customer: Theek hai mam kya kya karte karo kya aapko full authority hai ek to buylead karke do humko jo aap bol rahe hain wahi sun rahe hain ek saal se aaj tak IndiaMART se ₹10 nahi ₹10 paisa tak nahi hai.
Executive: Main samajh rahi hun aapki baat ko buylead main bhijwane ka start kar dungi.
Customer: Samajh lo aur ek saal lo aaram se samajh ke lo aapka promotion bhi hua hai congratulations.
Executive: Thank you so much sir thank you so much main bas wahi cheez aapse discussion karna chah rahi thi sir main dekho aapko nirash nahi karna chah rahi hun main aapke side se puri koshish kar rahi hun sir but wahi hai ki aapke jo cities hain na thodi limited city hai like Pune, Sangli, Belgaum aur Kolhapur ye bhi aapki city hai right to thoda sa kya hota hai sir limited city ho jati hai to limited cities mein na daily basis pe requirements nahi aa paati hain right to wahi cheez hota hai ki jab mere paas aati hai main aapko bhejungi aur maine khud expect kiya hai sir ki Diwali mein kya tha ki Diwali mein aap bhi samajhte ho October mein na Diwali ki chuttiyan hamari waise hi ek hafte ki ho gayi thi right to wahan pe kya tha ki wahan pe already hamara time kaafi zyada chala gaya tha chuttiyon ke chakkar mein to wahan par main aapko nahi bhej paayi thi lekin abhi main aaj se ensure kar rahi hun ki aapko daily basis pe ek hi buylead jaaye lekin jaaye.
Customer: Diwali ko khatam Diwali ka to kitna din hua mam Diwali aur ek Diwali aata hai.
Executive: Choti Diwali sir.
Customer: Theek hai mam theek hai aapko jaisa achcha lagta hai waise kijiye main kuch force bhi nahi kar raha hun.
Executive: Hai na theek hai to abhi na ye jo concern aapne mera aapka concern leke aap aaram baitho mere ko kuch bhi expectation nahi hai aap jo karenge usko hum haan bolenge bas kuch nahi.
Executive: Sir aisa nahi hai hum aapko try karte hain pura buylead bhejne ka main aapse bhi expect karungi ki aap mujhe nahi pehla bhi pehla bhi bola hun bheja to bhi chalega nahi bheja to bhi chalega.
Executive: Sir nahi aapko main definitely aage se buylead jayega sorry for that ki abhi tak aapko kuch according buylead nahi ja paayi hai lekin aapko aage se jayega.
Customer: Har baar yahi sun ke har baar yahi answer sun ke I am tired of it kuch naya kuch bolne ka prayas kijiye.
Executive: Sir aaj ab aaj se aap in aap aaj se aap note kar lijiyega aaj se agar aapko daily basis pe buylead nahi aati hai to aap mujhe please call karke bol lijiyega is cheez ke liye ki haan aapko buylead nahi aa rahi hai wahan pe phir hum dekhenge kya karna hai.
Executive: Theek hai lekin abhi main is cheez ka aapko mauka nahi dungi ki aapko ye lage ki hum har baar bolte hain aur karte nahi hain theek hai baki ye.
Executive: Haan baki ek cheez aur aapse bolna tha sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving enough buyleads.

- Wants buyleads via email instead of group.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with IndiaMART's services.



Resolution:

- Executive explained buyleads cannot be sent via email.

- Executive assured leads will be sent daily.

- Executive offered to add employee to group.

- Executive apologized for the lack of leads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to notify if leads are not received.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, email, whatsapp, group, city, diwali
